text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria clusioides is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Jamaica.  It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Psychotria clusioides". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33863A9809580. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33863A9809580.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
